Message: I hear thunder.

That horrible sound
is resonating in my
pitch black heart.

But all of a sudden,
a warm light appeared.

“It’s okay, Cerberus.
Big Sis is here now.”

Huh...? No... You’re lying...
There’s no way Big Sis is here...
’Cause...
...I killed her!

Please... Stop...
Don’t make me suffer any more...
H-Huh...? That...light...

It’s...Big Sis’s good luck charm—
the one she promised would mean
that she was always with me...

That...she would save me from
my bad dreams...
...I’m right here, Big Sis.
I...want to see you again...

As I wrapped my arms around
the light, I hear a voice.

It repeated those
special magic words—

the ones that have
always protected me.

“It’s okay, Cerberus.
Big Sis is here.”

I can’t hear
the thunder anymore.
A warm light...

slowly makes its way
into my heart.
